query.mssql:
SELECT DISTINCT Users.Id FROM Sungero_Core_Recipient As Users
INNER JOIN Sungero_System_Clients As UsersOnline ON UsersOnline.Login = Users.Login LEFT JOIN Sungero_System_Locks As Locks ON Locks.Login = Users.Login
WHERE Users.Login IS NOT NULL AND Users.IsSystem IS NULL AND Locks.Login IS NULL AND Users.Status = 'Active' AND (UsersOnline.ApplicationName like 'Local%' OR UsersOnline.ApplicationName like 'Web%') AND DATEDIFF(minute, CAST(UsersOnline.LastActivity AS DATETIME2), CAST('{1}' AS DATETIME2)) > {2} AND Users.Id not in ({0})
query.postgres:
SELECT DISTINCT Users.Id FROM Sungero_Core_Recipient As Users
INNER JOIN Sungero_System_Clients As UsersOnline ON UsersOnline.Login = Users.Login LEFT JOIN Sungero_System_Locks As Locks ON Locks.Login = Users.Login
WHERE Users.Login IS NOT NULL AND Users.IsSystem IS NULL AND Locks.Login IS NULL AND Users.Status = 'Active' AND (UsersOnline.ApplicationName like 'Local%' OR UsersOnline.ApplicationName like 'Web%') AND (DATE_PART('day', '{1}'::timestamp - UsersOnline.LastActivity::timestamp) * 24 + DATE_PART('hour', '{1}'::timestamp - UsersOnline.LastActivity::timestamp)) * 60 + DATE_PART('minute', '{1}'::timestamp - UsersOnline.LastActivity::timestamp) > {2} AND Users.Id not in ({0})
